programmes.title: Research
programmes.description: At CHAMPS, research is at the core of our mission to strengthen health systems, policies, and services. We generate evidence-based insights that guide governments, healthcare institutions, and communities in making informed decisions.

programmes.title: Training
programmes.description: CHAMPS develops comprehensive training programs that strengthen the skills of government officials, healthcare providers, and health leaders. Our programs combine evidence-based knowledge with practical tools, equipping participants to address today’s complex health challenges with confidence and strategic vision.

programmes.title: Consultation
programmes.description: CHAMPS provides expert guidance to governments, health institutions, and hospitals in designing and implementing effective health systems, strategies, and programs. Our team combines academic rigor with practical field experience to deliver solutions that strengthen health governance and service delivery.

programmes.title: Assistance
programmes.description: CHAMPS provides high-level advisory support to strengthen leadership capacity and guide long-term growth of health organizations. Our strategic services help institutions align vision, resources, and governance with evolving health challenges and opportunities.
